articles.title: ‘Good Will Dunkin’: Watch Ben Affleck, Tom Brady, Jennifer Aniston, and more in 2026 Super Bowl commercial
articles.description:
Ben Affleck delivered a nostalgic parody of "Good Will Hunting" full of '90s sitcom stars in the 2026 Super Bowl commercial for Dunkin'.

The post ‘Good Will Dunkin’: Watch Ben Affleck, Tom Brady, Jennifer Aniston, and more in 2026 Super Bowl commercial appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Ben Affleck stars in a Dunkin' commercial parodying 'Good Will Hunting' for Super Bowl 2026.
The ad features Boston icons like Tom Brady and Jennifer Aniston, appealing to local pride.
Dunkin' aims to strengthen community ties and boost local business through nostalgic marketing.

articles.title: Here’s Ann Michael Maye’s custom look for Super Bowl Sunday
articles.description:
Ann Michael Maye, the wife of Patriots star quarterback Drake Maye, made her Super Bowl entrance in a custom cropped Patriots jacket.

The post Here’s Ann Michael Maye’s custom look for Super Bowl Sunday appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Ann Michael Maye wore a custom Patriots jacket for Super Bowl Sunday.
She is the wife of Patriots quarterback Drake Maye.
Her appearance highlights local pride in the Patriots during the Super Bowl.

articles.title: Fall River man shot dead by police after shooting 2 officers, DA says
articles.description:
Nigel Vaughn, 40, was shot and killed after allegedly shooting two officers, striking one's elbow and the other's bulletproof vest.

The post Fall River man shot dead by police after shooting 2 officers, DA says appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Nigel Vaughn, 40, was shot dead by police after allegedly shooting two officers.
One officer was struck in the elbow, the other in a bulletproof vest.
The incident raises concerns about police safety and community relations in Fall River.

articles.title: Man charged with motor vehicle homicide after woman, 70, killed in New Bedford crash
articles.description:
The man is charged with motor vehicle homicide by OUI and negligence and was citing for possessing an open container of alcohol in a vehicle, the DA said.

The post Man charged with motor vehicle homicide after woman, 70, killed in New Bedford crash appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Man charged with motor vehicle homicide after a 70-year-old woman was killed in New Bedford.
The suspect faces charges of OUI, negligence, and possessing an open container of alcohol.
This incident raises concerns about road safety and alcohol-related accidents in the Boston area.

articles.title: 2 Framingham police officers off the force after misconduct probe, department says
articles.description:
The officers, whom the department has not named publicly, were placed on paid administrative leave in September.

The post 2 Framingham police officers off the force after misconduct probe, department says appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Two Framingham police officers were removed from the force following a misconduct investigation.
The officers were placed on paid administrative leave in September 2023.
This incident raises concerns about police accountability in the Framingham community.

articles.title: Super Bowl 2026: Watch Charlie Puth perform the National Anthem
articles.description:
The Grammy-nominated singer and Berklee grad belted out a heartfelt rendition of the Star-Spangled Banner before Super Bowl LX.

The post Super Bowl 2026: Watch Charlie Puth perform the National Anthem appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Charlie Puth performed the National Anthem at Super Bowl 2026 on February 8.
Puth, a Berklee College graduate, showcased his talent on a national stage.
Boston residents celebrate local talent gaining recognition during major events.

articles.title: Patriots’ Mack Hollins shows up in shackles, honors Mike Vrabel with separate Super Bowl outfit
articles.description:
Mack Hollins is no stranger to stealing headlines with his pregame outfits.

The post Patriots’ Mack Hollins shows up in shackles, honors Mike Vrabel with separate Super Bowl outfit appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Mack Hollins wore a prison jumpsuit to honor Mike Vrabel at Super Bowl LX.
Hollins aims to draw attention to social justice issues through his outfits.
Local fans appreciate Hollins' creativity and connection to Boston's sports culture.
